# zlib
list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/zlib")
find_package(ZLIB REQUIRED)
set(ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIRS ${ZLIB_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(ZLIB_LIBRARIES ${ZLIB_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)

# libjpg
list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/jpeg")
find_package(JPEG REQUIRED)
set(JPEG_INCLUDE_DIR ${JPEG_INCLUDE_DIR} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(JPEG_LIBRARIES ${JPEG_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)

# libpng
list(APPEND CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/lpng1634")
find_package(PNG REQUIRED)
set(PNG_INCLUDE_DIRS ${PNG_INCLUDE_DIRS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(PNG_LIBRARIES ${PNG_LIBRARIES} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(PNG_DEFINITIONS ${PNG_DEFINITIONS} PARENT_SCOPE)
